description: With step by step precision and sympathetic understanding this film shows the fascinating story behind the latest amazing advances in 'test-tube baby' or more accurately, In Vitro Fertilisation techniques, with human embryo transfer by the Monash University Medical Team at the Queen Victoria Medical Centre.
